messages.title: Labour's pledges to you
content: We will always give the NHS the money it needs and we will take the crisis in social care will link up services from home to hospital with a properly integrated health and social care service.
We will focus on what matters most in our schools: driving up teaching standards and keeping class sizes down.
We will protect the triple lock on pensions, keep the winter fuel allowance and free bus passes and make sure women most in need affected by the increase to their pension age will be helped.
We will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 an hour by 2020.
We will create 4 extra bank holidays to celebrate St. George’s, St. Andrew’s, St. Patrick’s and St. David’s day.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will always give the NHS the money it needs and will tackle the crisis in social care, linking up services from home to hospital with a properly integrated health and social care service.
We will focus on what matters most in our schools: driving up teaching standards and keeping class sizes down.
We will protect the triple lock on pensions, keep the winter fuel allowance and free bus passes, and make sure women most in need affected by the increase to their pension age will be helped.
We will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 an hour by 2020.
We will create 4 extra bank holidays to celebrate St. George’s, St. Andrew’s, St. Patrick’s, and St. David’s day.

contactInformation.address: Southampton Labour Party, Unit 8, Bassett Avenue, Andersons Road, Southampton, SO14 5FE
